titles.title: Commemorating the 70th anniversary of the foundation of the State of Israel and the opening of the United States Embassy in Jerusalem.
Commemorating the 70th anniversary of the foundation of the State of Israel and the opening of the United States Embassy in Jerusalem.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Middle East and North Africa.

committee.subcommittee: Middle East, North Africa and International Terrorism
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary: Commends: (1) Israel for maintaining friendly and meaningful relations with the United States over the past 70 years, and (2) the Trump Administration for recognizing Jerusalem as Israel's capital and relocating the U.S. embassy to Jerusalem.
